message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 expressions prohibited in PRIMARY KEY and UNIQUE constraints.
details:
[23-Apr-2025 11:33:54 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_cpd_relationships ( supervisor_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, participant_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, INDEX supervisor_id_FI (supervisor_id), INDEX participant_id_FI (participant_id), PRIMARY KEY relationship (supervisor_id,participant_id))

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: INSERT INTO _mysql_data_types_cache (`table`, `column_or_index`, `mysql_type`) VALUES (:table, :column, :datatype) ON CONFLICT(`table`, `column_or_index`) DO UPDATE SET `mysql_type` = :datatype | parameters: wp_cpd_relationships, supervisor_id, bigint(20)
  3. Executing: INSERT INTO _mysql_data_types_cache (`table`, `column_or_index`, `mysql_type`) VALUES (:table, :column, :datatype) ON CONFLICT(`table`, `column_or_index`) DO UPDATE SET `mysql_type` = :datatype | parameters: wp_cpd_relationships, participant_id, bigint(20)
  4. Executing: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "wp_cpd_relationships" ( "supervisor_id" integer NOT NULL ON CONFLICT REPLACE DEFAULT 0, "participant_id" integer NOT NULL ON CONFLICT REPLACE DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY ("(", ",", ")")) | (no parameters)
  5. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 expressions prohibited in PRIMARY KEY and UNIQUE constraints.
